title: SF WINDOWS 8 ENTERPRISE X86 Extreme 1,5gb - ACTIVATED
description:
SERBIANFORUM WINDOWS 8 Enterprise -EXTREME (x86 ) - 1.5 GB
 <a href="
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/xDBSEamRud.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/xDBSEamRud.png</a>

At issue is the Windows 8 Enterprise x 86 ( desktop version ) in ISO format SerbianForum style size 1.5 GB.Bootanje course the SF style as the desktop background .. Anyway after installing the OS is already activated ... and in my opinion, contains all what is needed to have a quality operating system ...

The difference compared to the classic Windows 8 installation is as follows ....

INTEGRATED IN THE INSTALLATION

- Winrar
- Activation
 <a href="
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/YZ3ADKF.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/YZ3ADKF.png</a>

Removed from INSTALLATIONS

Accessories

Metro - Bing
- Metro Bing Finance
Metro - Bing Maps
- Metro Bing News
Bing - Metro Sports
Metro - Bing Travel
Metro - Bing Weather
Metro - Media Play Ready
Metro - Reader
- Metro SkyDrive
- Metro Windows Live
- Metro Windows Photos
- Metro Windows Store
- Metro Xbox Live Games
- Metro Zune Music
- Metro Zune Video

Since they removed the items above from installations have virtually free Metro menu and you can set it to the desired application ..
 <a href="
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/hELQCg.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/hELQCg.png</a>

Of course the Metro menu is left web browser Internet Explorer 10th ... which is integrated google.com as start page ( instead of MSN or bing )

 <a href="
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/NhUd9.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/NhUd9.png</a>

Then he removed ....

- Autoplay
- Briefcase
- Character Map
- ClearType Tuner
- Diagnostics Troubleshooting Wizard
- Disk Quota
Display Switch
- IMAP
- Input Method Editor
- Natural Leanguage
-On- Screen Keyboard
- Private Character Editor
- Screen Magnifier
- Snipping Tool
- Everything related to Tablet ( Engine , Flick Learning Wizard , Journal, Keyboard Input Panel , Math Input Panel , Text Prediction )
- Windows Easy Transfer
- Write
-Zip Folder

Despite these deleted by me not so important things remained very powerful application menu with useful applications ....
 <a href="
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/UwljGmuc.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/UwljGmuc.png</a>

removed DRIVERS

- Display ( AGP, ATI Mobile, Intel HD, Intel GMA HD , Nvidia Mobile)
Hyper - V (Display , Keyboard, Network)
- exFAT
-Floppy Disk
-Game Gameport
-Game Xbox Controller
-ISA Support
-Network Externet ( Atheros , Broadcom , Emulex , JMicron , Marwell Yucon , Sis , Via )
- PCMCIA Support
- Printer & Scenner (Brother , East Kodak , Fuji Xerox , Konica , Kyocera , Oki , Ricox , Xerox )
- Storage ICP Raid
- Storage Intel

Then removed from the system ....

FONTS

- Removed the 90 fonts that use less or no use at all ...

LANGUAGES

- Removed the 46 languages Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹and are left in the system only Serbian , Croatian , English , France, Germany ... .

MULTIMEDIA

Removed the following ....

DVD , Media Video Playback
- Codec (MP3, MP4, MPEG2, MPEG4)
-Games Explorer
Hyper - V
Mobile PC
- Spreech
- Tagged Image File Format Ifilter
- Windows Media Player
- Windows PlayTo
- Windows PowerShell
- WinSAT

In principle this is solved by installing a codec pack clits and that's removed this multimedia ...

NETWORK

- Simple TPC -IP
- Smart Screen
- Trivial File Transfer Protocol
-Remote Differential Commpresion API

SERVICES

ActiveX
- Beep
- Biometric
- BranchChache

-Fax

THEMES

Removed from installing .....

Several theme - mouse size XXL
- All Screanseaveri ,
- All topics besides Earth and Flowers
 <a href="
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/r4pHd.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/r4pHd.png</a>

Tweaks

- Removed a few less important Desktop Option
- Removed a few Exolorer less important option
- Removed a couple taskbar controls that are poorly implemented
- Removed a few system options manjebitnih course

Despite removed all the above options the operating system is very functional , extremely fast and it must be recognized that the above options at least I think they do not have a big role , and that almost no use ....

One very interesting feature was added in the right- click of the mouse .... Power Option consisting of Restarts the computer, shutting down the machine and Logout ....
 <a href="
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/C5zi2.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://slike.serbianforum.org/images/2013/05/03/C5zi2.png</a>

It was also reserved and all the functionality of the menu which is located on the right side and which appears broaching mass in the upper or lower corner of the desktop ....
